content.rendered:
Romy Louise luxury scented candles are made in small batches by hand, in their humble family studio on the Gold Coast. Inspired by the picturesque, mountain top city of Toowoomba in the Springtime with all its beautiful botanical parks & quaint country gardens.

Treat someone special to a heartfelt gift, or indulge yourself!

• Handmade & hand poured
• 95+ hours burn time
• 425g weight
• 100% Coconut-Soy blend wax
• All-natural primed cotton wicks
• Sustainable ingredients & packaging
• Safely free from harmful metals & toxins
• Made in Australia

Our candles come presented in our signature gift bag and trailing ribbon.

GST Included. Delivery calculated at checkout.
